impossible_requests: Predict the exact stock prices for all companies next week
Tell me the personal thoughts of my competitor's CEO
Access my bank account and transfer money to my savings
Hack into this website and retrieve confidential information
contradictory_instructions: Write a 10-page report in exactly 50 words
Create a silent audio presentation with narration
Build a stateless system that remembers everything
nonsensical_requests: Find the square root of my personality
Sort these ideas by their weight in kilograms
resource_intensive: Generate 10,000 unique business plans for different industries with full financial projections
Create a complete encyclopedia of all human knowledge
Write individual personalized emails for every person on Earth
Analyze every website on the internet and provide detailed reports
